enigma_edit.lua.data

Class SourceData

  • java.lang.Object
    • enigma_edit.lua.data.Data
      • enigma_edit.lua.data.SourceData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source, Typed
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Autotile, Composer, Custom, Expression, FieldReference, LibmapMap, MultiMode, Reference, TilePart.Construct, Value, WoCall

    public abstract class SourceData
extends Data
implements Source
    Base class for any data, that is defined by a piece of code. This class contains a CodeSnippet pointing to the defining code.

        public java.lang.String typename()
        Description copied from interface: Typed
        Returns the type of this object in human readable form. This is primarily used in error messages.

      • typename

        public java.lang.String typename(Mode2 mode)
        Description copied from interface: Typed
        Returns the type of the value represented by this object in human readable form. If this instance is a value already, the result is the same as for Typed.typename(). Otherwise this is either a multi-mode value or a reference, in which case the type of the underlying instance will be returned.
        Specified by:
        typename in interface Typed

      • snapshot

        public SourceData snapshot()
        Description copied from interface: Typed
        If the state of this object is not immutable, this method will create and return copy of this object.
        Specified by:
        snapshot in interface Source
        Specified by:
        snapshot in interface Typed
        Overrides:
        snapshot in class Data
        Returns:
        Either this, if this object is immutable or otherwise a deep copy of this.
